title: Opodo Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123025045im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49439.jpg)   
   
Any ideas on this one? Custom, Modified...?   
Thanks
author: ochobeeguy

comments.content:
[signa](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123025045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/signa/normal-bold/testdrive.html?s=opodo&p=48)?   
 [prokyon](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123025045/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ProkyonRegular.html)?   
   
I don't think either of those are right, but they're not too far off.

My guess would be [Handel Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123025045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/handel-gothic/bold/testdrive.html?s=opodo&p=48) slightly condensed, but it errs on the side of boxiness where signa errs on the side of being too organic.

It also looks like it could be a beefed up version of [Skia](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123025045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cartercone/skia-cc/regular/testdrive.html?s=opodo&p=60). Wasn't there a bold weight of Skia at one time? Back in the heyday of programmatic TrueType?
